name: Bratwurst 2019
description:
Local multiplayer top-down shooter for 2 to 4 players. Challenge your friends to bullet hell couch battles.

The first incarnation of Bratwurst was an indie title released to critical acclaim in 1995 for the Amiga home computer, in the vein of cave flyer titles such as Thrust, Gravity Force, Roketz and Turbo Raketti. Here is a gameplay clip from the 1995 Amiga game.

This 2019 rendition of Bratwurst is a re-imagining of the classic game, designed for a new audience by one of the creative minds behind the original. Bratwurst 2019 features 7 of the original ships, 5 special weapons, and all of the action. Combine your favorite ship and weapons and get ready to win.

Version history

v0.1Early access beta.
